Contact

If you're interested in freelance work and have something small or well-defined, let's chat. Please be aware that I already have a handful of freelance clients, personal projects, and my day job.

If you have a question about Cerberus, consider opening an issue, pinging me on Twitter, or emailing me.

For anything else, shoot me an email!

Design and code (except graphics) are open source on GitHub. See the pull request for the current design, or read the credits.
